Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole 0.0625/1.2-16/304 μg/mL
BD PhoenixM Automated Microbiology System Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for Streptococcus susceptibility testing using trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole panels
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid identification and in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of isolates from pure cultures of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria, with Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only panels containing trimethoprim-sulfamethoxazole.
